name: Uninstall Crowdstrike Falcon on Windows
description: Uninstall Crowdstrike Falcon. If the WindowsSensor.exe path is not provided as an argument we need to search for it. Since the executable is located in a folder named with a random guid we need to identify it before invoking the uninstaller.

data.command: if (Test-Path "#{falcond_path}") {. "#{falcond_path}" /repair /uninstall /quiet } else { Get-ChildItem -Path "C:\ProgramData\Package Cache" -Include "WindowsSensor.exe" -Recurse | % { $sig=$(Get-AuthenticodeSignature -FilePath $_.FullName); if ($sig.Status -eq "Valid" -and $sig.SignerCertificate.DnsNameList -eq "CrowdStrike, Inc.") { . "$_" /repair /uninstall /quiet; break;}}}

input_arguments.name: falcond_path
input_arguments.description: The Crowdstrike Windows Sensor path. The Guid always changes.
